aircraft.value: Scorpion Assault - AC-1436-695 at Forward Operating Base-1

defect_observed.value: Starter generator malfunction. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.

root_cause.value: Environmental exposure causing accelerated degradation of protective coatings

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Turbine Assembly component. Physical examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.

corrective_action.value: Clean and re-lubricate affected assemblies per technical manual

preventive_action.value: Issue technical bulletin to all operators

remarks_investigation.value: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.

remarks_design.value: Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions. Date: 11/01/2025 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Manufacturing quality documentation reviewed. No deviations noted. Concur with investigation findings. Date: 13/01/2025 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational history analyzed. No abnormal usage patterns identified. Agree with proposed corrective actions. Date: 12/01/2025 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) From quality standpoint, root cause analysis is thorough. Corrective measures are appropriate. Concur. Date: 15/01/2025 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) From regulatory standpoint, investigation meets required standards. Approve proposed corrective actions. Date: 16/01/2025 Signature: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi
